Package com.webcheckers.model

Class CheckerGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webcheckers.model.CheckerGame

  • public class CheckerGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the game board and manages it. It takes two players and initializes a Checkers game board to play on.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    couchcoders

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckerGame

        public CheckerGame​(Player redPlayer,
                   Player whitePlayer)
        The constructor takes two players, a red and a white and generates a new Game board to play on. This also sets the essential properties about the game.
        Parameters:
        redPlayer - the first player
        whitePlayer - the second player
